body.name: Newbealer Handheld Steamer for Clothes, Horizontal & Vertical Steaming, 2 Steam Levels 20s Heat Up, Foldable, Dry Ironing, Portable 1200W 180ml Fabric Wrinkle Remover with Brush and Anti-heat Glove
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 21 hrs 9 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 21 hrs 9 mins
Or fastest pickup Thursday, February 15. Order within 15 hrs 9 mins
features: [Powerful 2 Levels Handheld Steamer] The Newbealer steamer takes about 20 seconds to heat up with the help of 1200W heating element and the unique 2 steam levels (16-24g/min) enable steam to pass through easily through the cloth to thoroughly and quickly remove wrinkles. Further the high temperature soleplate enhances the ironing effect and the 248-degree Fahrenheit steam can deep clean your clothes and also remove odors for a complete clean experience.

[360 Degree Leak Proof Technology & Easy to Use] The steamer is designed with a unique leak proof, anti-drip and anti-spill technology, so that you can steam from any angle without having to worry about leakage and it doubles as iron without or with steam. Further, the easy on and off access button with indicator light has a simple press function for a continuous flow of steam.

[Detachable Water Tank] The detachable design makes the steamer easy to refill. The transparent design of the water tank allows for a clear observation of the remaining water and 10 minutes of continuous steam (180ml) allows you to remove wrinkles, straighten more clothes for one time. We recommend you use demineralized or distilled water for the best performance.

[Elegant & Portable] The steamer is easily foldable for the exquisite, compact look, so that you can carry it around during your travel, without having to worry about space, ensuring you a smooth fabric even during your vacation. NOTE: Newbealer garment steamer is designed for use at 110~125-volt outlets only. A transformer+adapter plug is a must under the circumstance of 200~235V.

[Perfect Present & After Sales] This Package also included an attachable fabric brush and a one-piece heat-resistant ironing glove, which complements your fabric steamer perfectly. Ideal gift for your friends, family, lover, wife, parents on any occasion like Christmas, Thanksgiving, wedding. Further, our product comes with a 1-year warranty and if you are facing any issues, feel free to contact our customer care team, for a hassle-free experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Detachable Water Tank 180ml capacity allows for 10+ minutes of continuous steaming.The silicone plug can accurately block the opening. No leaks at any angles. One-button Switch 2 Steam levels or Dry Ironing - all can be controlled by the one-button switch.Choose the appropriate level to deal with fine & deep wrinkles easily Nozzle Brush Accessory Comes with an attachable fabric brush that helps steam thick garments like coats and jackets.Bristle brush loosens fibers to let steam reach deeper. Heat Resistant Glove Comes with 1pc anti steam heat-resistant ironing glove, no burns.Made of Heat Insulation and waterproof cloth, much lighter and thinner.

Horizontal Steaming The easiest way to get pesky wrinkles out of areas like cuffs and collars is to steam them horizontally, letting the underlying surface support your garment.No drips, no spots Vertical Steaming 2 level powerful steam make vertical ironing great for getting rid of wrinkles without an ironing board.Please keep the fabric taut and stretched, steam the garment with slow, downward strokes. Dry Ironing Long press the button to switch to Dry Ironing mode, with a lower temperature intentionally set at 194℉.We recommend using this mode exclusively for delicate fabrics such as silk, chiffon, and velvet. Smart Indicator Light Plug in, light keeps "flash yellow" --- Heating up (20s)Short press to change light from "solid yellow" (Low Steam) to "solid red" (High Steam)Long press to change light to "flash red" (Dry Ironing)

How to Attach or Take Out the Water Tank Please always align the latch when pushing in to avoid damage. Notes: Never allow the tank to run dry while the steamer is in use to prevent damage to the heating element.If your water tank is broken WITHIN ONE YEAR, simply reach out to us and we'll quickly send you a replacement tank!To find the replacement tank for your steamer after 6-12 months, you can search for B0CQQ5FB54.
Previous page Next page 1 Stylish and Compact 2 Portable 3 Travel Buddy 4 Use Steps 5 Accessories

Previous page Next page NOTE: This model NB316A is designed for use at 110~125-volt outlets only. A transformer+adapter plug is a must under the circumstance of 200~240v. If you require a dual-voltage option (supports both 100-127V and 220-240V), you can search for B0CFLKJDY5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this steamer! I wanted something that was a little more travel friendly since most places I stay don’t have a steamer readily available, and prefer to give something a quick steam vs. an iron (the last iron I had didn’t beat properly and even on the lowest setting burnt a hole through one of my favorite shirts so I swore off irons). It’s big enough to be useful but small enough to pack without it being difficult to manage inside luggage. It fit perfectly in the zippered bottom of my duffle bag (where shoes can be stored) but it’s also unassuming in my large suitcase or even a carry on. It has 3 settings but I’m not sure of the difference between the two on settings. It props up nicely on the counter top. The water chamber is easy to snap on and off, and gives you a little “click” to reassure you it’s been replaced properly before using again once refilled. It also looks high quality but is very affordable. Great value for the price and what you get!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The best for everyday and travel use! Quickly gets to temperature and works well on various fabric types. Foldable for easy storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great and good value for the money
reviews.reviewText: You definitely need to use the insulated glove that it comes with because it’s very very hot, but it really took the wrinkles out

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. Easy to fill, the water reservoir detached from the unit for easy filling. The handle is easy to grip. The steam is steady with no spitting in any position. I am very satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soooo much better than ironing!!!
reviews.reviewText: My sisters recommended this to me - they’d taken it on a cruise and just LOVED the way it was portable and worked so well (and quickly!)We bought it and love it, too. We love it so much, we’ve given two as gifts, and those folks also love it!It’s a great solution for traveling, or just if you hate ironing but don’t want to be a wrinkled mess. Lol.Would recommend and, clearly, would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super cute, space saver, powerful, removes all wrinkles easily. Be sure to always use distilled water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Will not work with an EU power adapter!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this steamer for a trip to Italy, but we couldn't use it at all because it blew the fuse in the power adapter. I'll use this for domestic travel in the US only since it is small for packing and does works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new steamer and didn’t want to get a standing one due to small space. This works perfectly. It’s easy to use and I love that it bends so you can use it on something like sheets on your bed.
Súper fácil de usar y transportar. Funciona perfecto y la súper recomiendo para viajes
Es ersetzt kein Bügeleisen, ist aber zum Auffrischen ganz wunderbar geeignet!!!Versand ging zack zack

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I previously owned a VERY expensive steamer, however I moved countries and had to replace it. This steamer is just as good if not better than my previous one at a fraction of the cost. It’s easy to use, steams great, water reservoir does about 2-3 garments depending on the size. Really happy with it so far
Hasta ahorita me ha encantado, no he tenido ningún problema con el producto. Muy recomendable

reviews.reviewerName: El proveedor ya me que cambiado la fecha de entrega 2 veces. Primero el 25 y nada y ahora que entre el 2 y 5 de agosto. Solo espero que si llegué.
reviews.reviewText: Llego a tiempo, muy bien empacada.Esta un poquito pesadita pero eso me gusta porque se ve que va a aguantar bastante para traerla en los viajes, se ve de buen material.Se calienta super rápido y es fácil activar la función de vaporizado.Muy fácil de usar y de guardar.
